title: Foundation (Razorland #0.5)

Storyline: 
 Foundation (Razorland 0.5) 
 In Ann Aguirreâ€™s award-winning novel, Enclave, humans have taken refuge in colonies below ground. Here is the story of what drove them there, told through the eyes of a teen who would later have vast influence over the fate of many, and who gave his heart to the one person who needed him most.
author: Ann Aguirre
